subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga defeated third-ranked Novak Djokovic, 6-4, 7-6 (1), to reach the final of the Open 13 in Marseille, France. Tsonga took a 5-0 lead in the tie breaker and had two forehand winners to clinch the match. Tsonga will face Michael Llodra in the final Sunday. Llodra defeated Gilles Simon, 7-6 (5), 6-2, in their semifinal.
